message:
SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 45
Process
2.4   Identify the thesaurus terms, tr, which are related terms of ti. They are referenced in 
the same record that contains ti.
2.5   For each one of the above identified thesaurus terms tr:
2.5.1  Create the corresponding ontology class, Cr class, if it is not created yet.
2.5.2  Set up the relatedClass relation between Cr and Ci.
2.5.3   Repeat from step 2.4 for tr as a new ti.
PR-NOR Example
45
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
